mapper.select: SELECT m.*, mp.mem_profile_saved_name, mp.mem_profile_original_name FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_profile mp ON m.member_id = mp.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT M.member_id, M.mem_password, M.mem_name, M.mem_zip_code, M.mem_address_detail, M.mem_email, M.mem_phone, M.mem_hire_date, M.mem_left_date, M.mem_is_active, M.dept_code, M.position_code, P.mem_position_sequence FROM member M LEFT JOIN member_dept D ON M.dept_code = D.member_dept_code LEFT JOIN member_position P ON M.position_code = P.member_position_code ORDER BY mem_is_active DESC, CASE WHEN M.member_id = 999999 OR M.position_code = 99 THEN 0 WHEN M.position_code = 17 THEN 999 ELSE P.mem_position_sequence END ASC, M.mem_hire_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE mem_is_active = '1'

SELECT M.member_id, M.mem_password, M.mem_name, M.mem_zip_code, M.mem_address_detail, M.mem_email, M.mem_phone, M.mem_hire_date, M.mem_left_date, M.mem_is_active, M.dept_code, M.position_code, P.mem_position_sequence, D.mem_dept_name, P.mem_position_name, MP.mem_profile_saved_name FROM member M LEFT JOIN member_dept D ON M.dept_code = D.member_dept_code LEFT JOIN member_position P ON M.position_code = P.member_position_code LEFT JOIN member_profile MP ON M.member_id = MP.member_id
AND M.dept_code = #{deptCode}
AND M.mem_is_active = '1'
AND( M.mem_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR M.member_id LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR D.mem_dept_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY mem_is_active DESC, CASE WHEN M.member_id = 999999 OR M.position_code = 99 THEN 0 WHEN M.position_code = 17 THEN 999 ELSE P.mem_position_sequence END ASC, M.mem_hire_date ASC

SELECT M.dept_code, D.mem_dept_name, COUNT(M.member_id) as count FROM member M JOIN member_dept D ON M.dept_code = D.member_dept_code
AND M.mem_is_active = '1'
AND( M.mem_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR M.member_id LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR D.mem_dept_name LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
GROUP BY dept_code, D.mem_dept_name ORDER BY M.dept_code ASC
SELECT MAX(member_id) FROM member WHERE member_id LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, mem_password, mem_name, mem_zip_code, mem_address, mem_address_detail, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_hire_date, mem_is_active, dept_code, position_code) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memPassword}, #{memName}, #{memZipCode}, #{memAddress}, #{memAddressDetail}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, #{memHireDate}, 1, #{deptCode}, #{positionCode})
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, ( SELECT mem_profile_saved_name FROM member_profile WHERE member_id = m.member_id AND mem_profile_is_active = true LIMIT 1 ) AS memProfileSavedName FROM member m WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mem_name = #{memName}, mem_zip_code = #{memZipCode}, mem_address = #{memAddress}, mem_address_detail = #{memAddressDetail}, mem_email = #{memEmail}, mem_phone = #{memPhone}, dept_code = #{deptCode}, position_code = #{positionCode} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
UPDATE member_profile SET mem_profile_original_name = #{originalName}, mem_profile_saved_name = #{savedName}, mem_profile_created_at = NOW(), mem_profile_is_active = 1 WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_profile ( mem_profile_original_name, mem_profile_saved_name, mem_profile_created_at, mem_profile_is_active, member_id ) VALUES ( #{originalName}, #{savedName}, NOW(), 1, #{memberId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mem_is_active = #{memIsActive}, mem_left_date = now() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.mem_name FROM member m LEFT JOIN store s ON m.member_id = s.member_id WHERE m.mem_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND s.member_id IS NULL AND m.member_id LIKE '2%'

SELECT m.member_id, m.mem_name, m.mem_email, m.mem_phone, COUNT(CASE WHEN smh.manage_end_date IS NULL THEN smh.manage_id END) AS dept_code FROM member m LEFT JOIN store_manager_history smh ON smh.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.dept_code = 13 AND m.mem_is_active = 1 AND m.mem_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') GROUP BY m.member_id ORDER BY dept_code, m.mem_name
